name: projectsports
description: SNTLMO Exclusive Sports Grid web application

scripts.build: bash -c 'echo "--- DEBUG: Environment Variables before build-env.sh --- "; echo FIREBASE_API_KEY_VAL=$FIREBASE_API_KEY; echo FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID_VAL=$FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID; echo FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET_VAL=$FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET; echo FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID_VAL=$FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID; echo FIREBASE_APP_ID_VAL=$FIREBASE_APP_ID; echo GEMINI_API_KEY_VAL=$GEMINI_API_KEY; echo "------------------------------------------------------"; rm -rf dist; mkdir -p dist; sh ./build-env.sh; node esbuild.config.js; npm run tailwind:build; cp index.html dist/index.html; cp _redirects dist/_redirects'
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only hosting
